.. _typing:

Typing
======

.. module:: sisl.typing

sisl will use `typing <https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html>`__
to enable static analyzers and to aid users when reading documentation.

The typing types is shown below:

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated/

   AtomsArgument
   OrbitalsArgument
   SileLike
   AtomsLike
   LatticeLike
   GeometryLike
   LatticeOrGeometry
   LatticeOrGeometryLike
